nodeList.altText: The freeze rate of {Ice Arrow} increases by 6% per point of intelligence. All nodes which affect Fire Arrow affect Ice Arrow instead.

nodeList.nodeDescription: Converts Fire Arrow into Ice Arrow, which cannot ignite, but has a freeze rate of 30.

nodeList.altText:
Acid Flask has a 5 second cooldown by default.

Armour Shred reduces armour by 100, lasts 4 seconds, and can stack.
nodeList.description: Skeleton Rogues throw {Acid Flasks}, which inflict poison and armor shred on hit.  Acid Flask has a 5 second cooldown.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Rogues throw Acid Flasks, which inflict poison and armour shred on hit.

node.altText:
Teleport has an 8 second cooldown by default.

Shurikens has a 4 second cooldown by default, and can store 2 charges.
node.description: Adds Skeleton Rogues to the pool of Skeletons that can be summoned. Rogues teleport to distant enemies, throw shurikens, and use melee attacks.
node.nodeDescription: Adds Skeleton Rogues to summon pool. They teleport to distant enemies, throw Shurikens, and use melee attacks.

nodeList.altText: Your limit for each type of Skeleton is equal to your maximum number of Skeletons divided by how many types of Skeletons you have enabled, rounded up.
nodeList.description: Skeleton Rogues gain an amount of increased cooldown recovery divided by your maximum number of summonable Skeleton Rogues.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Skeleton Rogues have [50%] increased cooldown recovery speed per point, divided by your limit of Skeleton Rogues.
